snippet.title: Tales of the LASER KNIGHTS - Spring 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the updated gameplay trailer for "Tales of the Laser Knights" - basically just an updated version of the last trailer from Summer 2023 :)

Shortly before the Demo Version release, I wanted to update the trailers since the game is looking and feels so much different now... many of the light FX have only been added recently, and also the whole sound FX and music was replaced and polished :)

Watch out for the upcoming Demo Version ... maybe tomorrow? 

 #indiegames #scifi #gaming #trailer #indiegame #actionadventure #laserknights #nostalgia
